name: Explosive Candy
description:
Explosive Candy is a 2d pixel art platformer in which you move very, very differently. Instead of walking and jumping around freely through the levels, you have to use explosive candies to move your character and interact with the world.

To complete levels you'll have to reach the giant candy cane after collecting every strawberry.

Aim and shoot candy using your mouse. You can press and hold to aim more carefully and adjusting your strength.
